about_the_game:
Over 150 pages that dive into the making of Abandon Ship. A wealth of concept art and behind the scenes images not only provide insight into how the game was made, but also the thinking behind the development team and their approaches.

This digital artbook is split into 3 sections covering:
  • Concept Development - the story behind our original artistic inspiration and how we translated that to concept art and in-engine graphics.
  • Pre-Production - How we established everything from islands, characters, the logo and all the varying environmental modifiers.
  • Production - Sea Monsters, Ships, Weapons, Upgrades, Sea Forts, how we conveyed the story, a focus on two key areas (The Haunted Seas and Spider Islands) as well as all of the individual unique islands

Once downloaded, the Artbook can be located in the following directory:
\Steam\steamapps\common\Abandon Ship\Artbook
